channel.title: Making something 2 handed
channel.description:
Hi. I need help making a godsword 2 handed instead of holding it like a vesta's longsword. I really need help, so I uploaded 5 images to help show the problem. Hopefully it explains it better than me. image 1: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help1.jpg?t=1279896653[/img] image 2: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help2.jpg?t=1279896653[/img] image 3: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help3.jpg[/img] image 4: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help4.jpg?t=1279896653[/img] image 5: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help5.jpg?t=1279896653[/img]
Image 5 was removed by Photobucket because I put a no-no word in it :(
image 6: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help6.jpg?t=1280087675[/img] image 7: [img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/help7.jpg?t=1280087675[/img]
I reposted because my last one was never answered and therefore left thrown in the back with the rest of the unsolved questions. I don't know if it's against the rules to repost... But if it is, I'm sorry and didn't really mean it.. I'm just desperate for an answer :s Theres a problem.. Someone gives me an answer, it doesn't really work or it's already added but messed up, and then they get stumped, never post, and leave this topic to sit here and die.. by die i mean go back really far to like page 10 :(

item.title: Making something 2 handed
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

did you add it to “twoHanderz”?
Also might have something to do with “is2Hander”

Read full topic

item.title: Making something 2 handed
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

ChaosPkers:

im no whizz or anythign probably dont belong in the server help section but maybe its client sided? i dont fucking know im just making an attempt…

Might be. Not sure though, once I figure out why it’s not holding right I’ll say

Edit…
This might be something about the error… Take a look all you java experts :o

[code=java] case 41: // wear item
int wearID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int wearSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

        interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
        for (int I = 0; I < twoHanderz.length; I++) {
            if (wearSlot == 5 && is2Hander()) {
                sendMessage(
                        "Two handed item = You cant equip a 2hander with a shield");
            } else if (playerEquipment[playerShield] != -1
                    && wearID == twoHanderz[I]) {
                sendMessage("You cant equip a 2hander with a shield");
            } else {
                wear(wearID, wearSlot);
            }
        }
        flushOutStream();
        break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:7, topic:351131”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=447490.msg3284204#msg3284204 date=1280090367]

you need to add standing animations for each weapon, and have you already added the new gs stance emote to your client?
anways look in your Player class, trying searching for “stand” no quotes.

this is for your second question btw.

‘Cannot find “stand”’ I’m not that retarded, i searched without quotes.

Vain, it is reading from twoHanderz and not “two_hand”.
[/quote]
LOL LOL LOL, not that retarded made me almost fall over,

Obviously you would add it in. duh.[/quote]
No, I add it in with some crap around with it and st00f
i don’t just add “stand”. asshole -.-
